description: This source file provides utility functions for cryptographic operations, including generating UUIDs, extracting application references from URLs, and creating scoped salts for encryption purposes. It also contains tests for the salting functionality.

methods.name: uuid_from(r1: String, r2: String) -> String
methods.description: Generates a version 5 UUID based on two string inputs by creating a namespace-based UUID.

methods.name: extract_app_ref(app_url: String) -> String
methods.description: Parses a URL string to extract the domain's second last and last parts, constructing an app reference string.

methods.name: salt_using_app_scope( app_scope: String, reference: String, id_salt: Option<IdSalt>, ) -> String
methods.description: Creates a cryptographic salt string scoped to an app, optionally using SHA1 hashing with given salts.

ctags.name: salt_using_app_scope
ctags.signature: ( app_scope: String, reference: String, id_salt: Option<IdSalt>, ) -> String

ctags.name: uuid_from
ctags.pattern: /^pub fn uuid_from(r1: String, r2: String) -> String {$/
